name: Deceived (Deqdew)
description:
Description:

Game for Brackeys GameJam 2023.1 fight monsters, explore dungeon, earn money, buy upgrades till you will be able to defeat the boss.

Controls:

Press "R" to restart from beggining.

Press "Space" to dash (if unlocked).

Press "RightClick" to block some attacks(if unlocked).

Credits:

Programmer: Deqdew

Pixel artist: Deqdew,JustMaciek.

Music: Unity asset store,sfxr.
